Name: Sodalite Na_8Al_6Si_6O_24Cl_2
Type: Mineral
Class: Silicates
Subclass: Tectosilicates
Particle Size: 45-125um
Sample No.: TS-10A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VNIR-SWIR
Origin: Canada, Ontario, Hastings County, Bancroft
Collected by JPL
Description: 





Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units:  Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:  Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:   0.40
Last X Value:   2.50
Number of X Values:  826
Additional Information: ts10aa.txt
